channel.title: [317] ::object Command [317]
channel.description: hey guys, currently i am coding paradiseX source and there is no ::object command on there, so if you have it could you paste the code under your post :) and it dosent need to go into the client.java and makeglobalobject but just so it will spawn but not be permanent if you know what i mean... anyways... thanks :)

item.title: [317] ::object Command [317]
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

if (command.startsWith("object")) { int objectid = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7)); makeGlobalObject(absX, absY, objectid, 0, 10); }

Something like that?

Read full topic
